== Demo App ==

The demo app shows off a great deal of the functionality of the calendar.  It's easy to get going.

You'll need the sqlite3-ruby gem:

{{{
sudo gem install sqlite3-ruby
}}}

To install and run the demo:

{{{
# Clone the application 
git clone git://github.com/timcharper/cds_demo.git
cd cds_demo
git submodule init && git submodule update  
script/server
}}}
